title: 'You have Disconnected, Please check youre internet then try again' after repairing 6.2 patch update
body: So this arvo around 2 pm I tried playing a ranked game with my mate but it crashed and when I restarted I had to repair my corrupt files, after this I tried to reconnect but everytime even after i restarted my internet and repaired my files it kept sending the same message everytime i tryed to connect to a game even customs and I would really like to play but I cant seem to fix this problem...

replies.body:
Thanks for letting us know.

What ISP are you with and what location are you in?

Mindstar

This has been happening since the new patch update to many of us. The black screen comes up after champion selection and we're unable to connect. Its not my ISP, and I live in New Zealand. 

Since http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-server-issues-28th-jan-2015

I have tested the connection with creating my own game. But its still not connecting.
my ISP is called UniFone btw
That problem doesnt occur anymore for some reason but now I simply cannot get into the game after champion select...
Im in canberra ACT and I am with Iinet
